name: Twake Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Twake Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Twake API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Twake API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: message
available_options: Message (值: message) - Send data to the message app

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send

channelId.name: channelId
channelId.description: Channel's ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
channelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel Name or ID | 作用: Channel's ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

content.name: content
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: Message content | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: senderIcon (值: None) - URL of the image/icon
